short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that replaces LinkedIn rainbow logo with the regular LinkedIn logo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Those Linkedin users who find it bothering that during the month of June the traditional Linkedin logo is replaced with the rainbow flag, here is the solution. Just install this simple app, pin it, and you are good to go!
